ShaderNodePreset.Name: JT_SyLens
ShaderNodePreset.Description: Straightens and distorts footage according to the Syntheyes lens distortion model. Send a mail to me@julik.nl if you have questions. See this tutorial video made by Joel Osis for instructions https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S_mfdIyCSWE

Uniform.Name: kCoeff
Uniform.Tooltip: Quartic distortion coefficient (the K coefficient). This can be computed automatically in Syntheyes when using 'Calculate Lens Distortion'

Uniform.Name: kCube
Uniform.Tooltip: Cubic distortion (Kcube). Apply this if you are dealing with mustache distortion. Normally you would leave it at 0.

Uniform.Name: apply_disto
Uniform.Tooltip: Apply distortion instead of removing it. Make sure you have enough overscan in your input!

Uniform.Name: uShift
Uniform.Tooltip: If the optical center of your lens is offset relative to the sensor/film back center add some shift here to distort off-center horizontally.

Uniform.Name: vShift
Uniform.Tooltip: If the optical center of your lens is offset relative to the sensor/film back center add some shift here to distort off-center vertically.
